description: Athan provides the Islamic Prayer Times in a given city. You can ask Athan for the five prayer times for the day or for the time of the next prayer. Disclaimer: Prayer times are provided by MuslimSalat.com. Skill icon is provided by http://www.designbolts.com.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Daily Prayers for prayer times in Seattle
Alexa, ask Daily Prayers for next prayer in New York
name: Athan
shortDescription: Athan provides the Islamic Prayer Times in a given city.
